summary: "A Tale of Two Cities" is a book by Charles Dickens about the French Revolution. It follows Dr. Manette, who spends 18 years in prison in Paris, and his daughter Lucie, who lives in London. After his release, he moves to London to be with her. The story shows the events leading up to the Revolution and its scary "Reign of Terror." This book is very popular and has been made into movies, TV shows, and plays.
title: A Tale of Two Cities
